events.title: Alberta Sovereignty Within a United Canada Act Passed
events.description:
The Alberta government enacted the Sovereignty Act, authorizing the province to defy specific federal laws and regulations. Critics warned of constitutional risks and business uncertainty.

Quote: "An act to protect Alberta from federal overreach," said Premier Danielle Smith.

analysis.patterns: Federal-provincial relations strained • Legal challenges launched by private citizens and Indigenous groups

charterRights.justification: Provincial authority to defy federal law raises treaty rights concerns

events.title: Bill 18: Alberta Online Harms Act
events.description: The UCP introduced Bill 18, which mandates social media companies to reduce the spread of hate content and misinformation. Critics claim it combines real harms and vague provisions.

analysis.patterns: Creates new provincial digital regulator • Civil liberties groups express concern • Unclear coordination with federal Bill C-36

events.title: UCP Launches $600 Affordability Payments
events.description: To help with inflation, UCP approved $600 affordability payments to all households earning under $180,000/year and extra support to AISH recipients and families.

analysis.patterns: Over 1.2 million Albertans received relief • NDP called for more targeted supports

events.title: Minimum Wage Frozen for Third Year
events.description: Alberta's minimum wage remains unchanged at $15/hour, causing Alberta to fall behind most of Canada. UCP government claims higher wages would reduce jobs.

analysis.patterns: Adjusted for inflation, real wage has fallen 8% • Labor groups call for restoration to $17/hr

events.title: Parents' Rights Act: LGBTQ Education Restrictions
events.description: Legislation requires parental notification for any pronoun or gender support discussions. Critics state it endangers trans and gender-diverse students.

analysis.patterns: Teachers must seek parental approval for support • Backlash from mental health organizations

charterRights.justification: Parental notification requirements may compromise student privacy and security
